posts.post_content:
Does anybody have a T206 Jake Beckley graded by SGC available in the $30-50 range? Looking at recent sales on eBay, the price range seems to be very reasonable and doable. The cheaper the better, as long as it's presentable. Looking in the 10-30 range grade-wise. Creases and corner wear doesn't bother me much, but I don't like marks or paper loss. 

Thank y'all in advance! Cheers to the last day of 2016, and to a phenomenal 2017 to be!

After acquiring my other target - Lundgren KC - this has become the top priority. Let me know if you have one!

I would also consider any other HoFer graded by SGC in the $30-40ish range.
